name: Nom Nom Gnomes
description:
Nom Nom party for up to 4 gnomes!

Nom as much food as you can! When 36 plates has been nommed, round ends! The gnome who nommed the highest score wins!

  • Gnome 1: Arrow-Keys + Space to Nom
  • Gnome 2: WASD-keys + Q to Nom
  • Gnome 3: TFGH-keys + R to Nom
  • Gnome 4: IJKL-keys + U to Nom

F4 toggles Fullscreen. The game has controller support!

Avoid nomming bad food, those will poison your gnome! Gain Sugar-Rush by nomming candies! Gain Strength by nomming drinks!

If you enjoy the game, get the Soundtrack ($1 Donation), composed by Aleksander Vinter aka 'SAVANT'!

Nom away!
